name: Sharky Subscribers
description:
Get BIG SHARK to 4M SHRIMPS! 

This is a hololive fangame to celebrate Gura reaching 4M subscribers.

It also serves as a super late birthday gift.

Swim through the ocean and build your army of stinky shrimps and other sea creatures as fast as humanly sharkily possible.

      🔱Credits

The game was made by fie @zkfie and  Kevin牛 @KevinCow

Do check Kevin's other games here : https://moocow-games.itch.io/

"REFLECT" 8-bit Cover by FabulousReindeer

"REFLECT" METAL Cover by Aerize

"REFLECT" original by Gawr Gura

 

      🔱Music

REFLECT - Gawr Gura . https://youtu.be/nCQ_zZIiGLA

REFLECT - 8-bit MMC5 + 1-N163 Cover  . https://youtu.be/xkNkJ6M7oEQ

REFLECT - METAL Cover  . https://youtu.be/U52X2ulsnk4

      🔱Disclaimer

This is a free fangame. We are not affiliated nor endorsed by Hololive, Cover Corp, or Gawr Gura in any capacity.

Feel free to do whatever type of content you would like to with the game, like videos and posts. 

Please share it with us if you do!
